title.name: Title for Macro Manager: {number}
title.hint: This is the title of the Macro Manager: {number}.

macros.name: Macro List for Macro Manager: {number}
macros.hint: Add the names of the macros you want to show on this field. You must add ; after each macro name. You must put exactly the macro name. The macro must be in the world.

persistent.name: Persistent for Macro Manager: {number}
persistent.hint: Check this to keep the Macro Dialog in the screen after click in one macro.

player.name: Enable Player Shortcut: {number}
player.hint: This will let your players trigger the shortcuts.

fontsize.name: Font Size
fontsize.hint: This will change the font size for the macro label.

keybindings.name: Macro Manager: {message}
keybindings.hint: This will trigger the Macro Manager: {message}.
